name: gcp-monorepo-secret-manager
description: A Google Cloud Secret Manager utility for managing environment variables across different environments and services within a monorepo.

scripts.prerelease: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.unpublish:help: echo 'To unpublish a specific version: npm unpublish gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@VERSION'
scripts.deprecate:current: npm deprecate gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") "This version has been deprecated"
scripts.deprecate:minor: npm deprecate gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") "Minor bugs fixed in newer versions. Update when convenient."
scripts.deprecate:major: npm deprecate gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") "CRITICAL: Major bugs or security issues. Please update immediately!"
scripts.deprecate:enhancement: npm deprecate gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") "New features and improvements available in latest version. Consider upgrading."
scripts.deprecate:security: npm deprecate gcp-monorepo-secret-manager@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") "SECURITY ALERT: Critical vulnerability found. Update immediately!"
scripts.deprecate:help:
echo 'Deprecation options:
  npm run deprecate:minor - For minor bugs
  npm run deprecate:major - For critical issues
  npm run deprecate:enhancement - For feature upgrades
  npm run deprecate:security - For security issues
  npm run deprecate:current - Generic deprecation'
scripts.clean:publish: npm run unpublish:current && npm run publish:beta

author: Adam Siwiec
